DOC.brief_title: Persistence Immune Response Hepatitis B 7-9 Years Old Children Previously Vaccinated With DTPa-HBV-IPV/Hib
DOC.criteria: A male female age 7 9 year time study entry . Subjects receive total 4 dos DTPaHBVIPV/Hib vaccine total 4 dos HBV vaccine previous vaccination study . Evidence previous hepatitis B booster vaccination disease since administration fourth dose DTPaHBVIPV/Hib HBV vaccine .
